title: Branch Office Loan Process Wall Poster
description: Photograph of laminated loan origination process poster displayed in branch operations area. Poster is dated 2022 and shows outdated process flow with 30-day target timeline, which conflicts with current average cycle times of 42-45 days.
annotations: Poster dated 'Revised: March 2022' - over 3 years old
Shows 30-day close target vs actual 42-45 day average (EV-005)
Missing FHA Streamline and VA IRRRL products added in 2023
Does not reflect Encompass v24 workflow changes
Handwritten note in margin: 'See Patricia for current steps'
finding: INCONSISTENCY - Displayed process guidance does not match current practice or system configuration
